verses.text: I am sought of \add them that\add* asked not \add for me:\add* I am found of \add them that\add* sought me not: I said, Behold me, behold me, Unto a nation \add that\add* was not called by my name.
I have spread out mine hands all the day unto a rebellious people, Which walketh \add in\add* a way \add that was\add* not good, after their own thoughts;
A people that provoketh me to anger continually to my face; That sacrificeth in gardens, and burneth incense upon altars of brick;
Which remain among the graves, And lodge in the monuments, Which eat swine’s flesh, And broth of abominable \add things is in\add* their vessels;
Which say, Stand by thyself, Come not near to me; for I am holier than thou. These \add are\add* a smoke in my nose, A fire that burneth all the day.
Behold, \add it is\add* written before me: I will not keep silence, but will recompense, Even recompense into their bosom,

Your iniquities, and the iniquities of your fathers together, saith the \sc Lord\sc*, Which have burnt incense upon the mountains, And blasphemed me upon the hills: Therefore will I measure their former work into their bosom.

Thus saith the \sc Lord\sc*, As the new wine is found in the cluster, And \add one\add* saith, Destroy it not; for a blessing \add is\add* in it: So will I do for my servants’ sakes, That \add I\add* may not destroy them all.
And I will bring forth a seed out of Jacob, And out of Judah an inheritor of my mountains: And mine elect shall inherit it, And my servants shall dwell there.
And Sharon shall be a fold of flocks, And the valley of Achor a place for the herds to lie down in, For my people that have sought me.
But ye \add are\add* they that forsake the \sc Lord\sc*, That forget my holy mountain, That prepare a table for \add that\add* troop, And that furnish the drink offering unto \add that\add* number.

Therefore will I number you to the sword, And ye shall all bow down to the slaughter: Because when I called, ye did not answer; When I spake, ye did not hear; But did evil before mine eyes, And did choose \add that\add* wherein I delighted not.

Therefore thus saith the Lord \sc God\sc*, Behold, my servants shall eat, but ye shall be hungry: Behold, my servants shall drink, but ye shall be thirsty: Behold, my servants shall rejoice, but ye shall be ashamed:
Behold, my servants shall sing for joy of heart, But ye shall cry for sorrow of heart, And shall howl for vexation of spirit.
And ye shall leave your name for a curse unto my chosen: For the Lord \sc God\sc* shall slay thee, And call his servants by another name:

That he who blesseth himself in the earth shall bless himself in the God of truth; And he that sweareth in the earth shall swear by the God of truth; Because the former troubles are forgotten, And because they are hid from mine eyes.
For, behold, I create new heavens and a new earth: And the former shall not be remembered, nor come into mind.
But be you glad and rejoice for ever \add in that\add* which I create: For behold, I create Jerusalem a rejoicing, and her people a joy.
And I will rejoice in Jerusalem, and joy in my people: And the voice of weeping shall be no more heard in her, nor the voice of crying.

There shall be no more thence an infant of days, Nor an old man that hath not filled his days: For the child shall die an hundred years old; But the sinner \add being\add* an hundred years old shall be accursed.
And they shall build houses, and inhabit \add them;\add* And they shall plant vineyards, and eat the fruit of them.

They shall not build, and another inhabit; They shall not plant, and another eat: For as the days of a tree \add are\add* the days of my people, And mine elect shall long enjoy the work of their hands.
They shall not labour in vain, Nor bring forth for trouble; For they \add are\add* the seed of the blessed of the \sc Lord\sc*, And their offspring with them.
And it shall come to pass, that before they call, I will answer; And whiles they are yet speaking, I will hear.

The wolf and the lamb shall feed together, And the lion shall eat straw like the bullock: And dust \add shall be\add* the serpent’s meat. They shall not hurt nor destroy in all my holy mountain, saith the \sc Lord\sc*.
